ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] The Creation of Clockwork Machines
ygData.msgSnippet: In all honesty, I would be amazed if all of the possible combinations have actually been attempted :).... but truly never in all of the experimentation has an
ygData.messageBody:
In all honesty, I would be amazed if all of the possible combinations have
actually been attempted :).... but truly never in all of the experimentation
has an item been produced beyond what is taught in the journals of
Gimblestan (http://www.eqportal.com/tinkering/gimblestan.html). There are
many anomalous items that seem to be related to tinkering, but as of yet
wont fit into any of the blueprints. Hopefully, a new journal will be
discovered soon on the new continents, as there is rumour of a clockwork
dragon (which means a tinker is nearby). Also, its obvious that a tinker
founded the outpost in the overthere due to the large number of metal
merchants.

Cogg

----- Original Message -----
From: <jcs0001@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 19, 2000 6:54 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] The Creation of Clockwork Machines


> Forgive me if this sounds "new" as i have just joined Everquest Last
> night, but i have tried searching for any information on the
> whereabouts of clockwork information, and I havent found anthing to
> dissuade my inquiry.
>
> There is a Gnome in the 3rd tower with a pet Clockwork Spider
> named "Charlotte"
>
> There are 5 distinct types of clockworks that i have seen: Male Rat,
> Female Rat, Spider, Female Humanoid, Male Humanoid.
>
> Parts for the majority of these creatures can be found in abundance
> outside Ak'Anon.
>
> Has anyone tried Merging the various parts to constuct a Pet
> Clockwork?
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Best friends, most artistic, class clown Find 'em here:
> http://click.egroups.com/1/5533/0/_/444587/_/961466067/
